featuresSection.heading: Explore Diverse Independent House Rental Options Available in Sector 105 Gurgaon
description: Sector 105 stands out in the Gurgaon rental market for its focus on low-density, independent housing solutions. Unlike high-rise apartment complexes, renting an independent house here provides residents with more privacy, dedicated parking space, and often a small private outdoor area. When you decide to rent house in Sector 105, you gain access to a quality of life characterized by tranquility and modern urban conveniences.

Our curated selection includes properties that cater to varied needs, from newly constructed builder floors ideal for young professionals to large, multi-story independent villas perfect for joint families. We ensure that every listing provides comprehensive details on square footage, amenities, and current maintenance status. Understanding the local rental landscape allows us to match you with a property that not only meets your requirements but also provides exceptional long-term value and satisfaction.

features.title: Builder Floor Rentals
features.description: These properties are incredibly popular in Sector 105 offering modern construction and independent entry points. Builder floors typically feature well-planned layouts, premium fittings, and offer the privacy of an independent home without the maintenance hassle of a full villa. They are perfect for small families or executive rentals seeking high-quality finishings and secure living environments near essential services.

features.title: 2 BHK Independent Houses
features.description: Ideal for couples or small nuclear families, 2 BHK independent houses for rent in Sector 105 provide adequate space at competitive price points. These units often come semi-furnished and are situated in well-connected pockets of the sector, guaranteeing easy access to main roads and local markets. We verify the property condition and documentation to ensure a smooth transition into your new rental home.

features.title: 3 BHK Independent Houses
features.description: The most commonly sought configuration, 3 BHK independent houses offer ample living space, usually spread across two or more floors, providing distinct living and private areas. This size is perfect for growing families who prioritize space, dedicated utility areas, and sometimes a terrace or balcony. Our inventory includes both newly built and well-maintained resale properties ready for immediate occupancy.

features.title: Large Villas for Rent
features.description: For those seeking luxury and expansive space, several large villas are available in Sector 105. These premium rental homes boast high-end specifications, private gardens, servant quarters, and advanced security features. These rentals cater to high-net-worth individuals or large families requiring substantial room for comfortable, sophisticated living in a prestigious address.

features.title: Semi-Furnished Options
features.description: Many properties offered for rent in Sector 105 are semi-furnished, providing essential fixtures like modular kitchens, wardrobes, lighting, and fans. This setup offers flexibility, allowing tenants to personalize the space with their own furniture while minimizing move-in costs and effort. We ensure all existing fixtures are in excellent working order before listing the property.

features.title: Fully-Furnished Options
features.description: If convenience is your priority, explore our fully-furnished house rentals. These homes are move-in ready, equipped with high-quality furniture, electronics, and kitchen appliances. Fully-furnished options are especially suitable for expats or corporate leases, offering a hassle-free start to living in Sector 105 Gurgaon.

locationsSection.title: Key Connectivity and Nearby Landmarks Defining Sector 105 Living
description: Sector 105 enjoys a strategic location within the New Gurgaon corridor, offering unparalleled connectivity that enhances its rental value. The sector benefits immensely from its adjacency to the Dwarka Expressway, which provides rapid transit towards Delhi and other major Gurgaon sectors. This positioning makes the area highly attractive for professionals commuting to Cyber City, Udyog Vihar, or Delhi.

Renting a house in Sector 105 places you in a neighborhood poised for exponential growth, with planned infrastructure and proximity to essential social amenities. Residents have easy access to top-tier schools, multispecialty hospitals, and burgeoning commercial complexes nearby. The well-developed road network and planned metro expansion further cement Sector 105's reputation as a prime location for long-term residential rentals in Gurgaon.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Renting Independent Houses in Sector 105
faqSection.description: Get comprehensive answers to your most pressing questions about the rental process, lease agreements, and market pricing specific to Sector 105 Gurgaon.

faqs.question: What is the typical rental price range for a 3 BHK independent house in Sector 105 Gurgaon
faqs.answer: Rental prices in Sector 105 vary significantly based on property size, age of construction, level of furnishing, and exact proximity to the Dwarka Expressway. Generally, a modern, well-maintained 3 BHK independent house or builder floor can range from INR 25,000 to INR 45,000 per month. Luxury villas or exceptionally spacious properties with private gardens will command higher rents, often exceeding INR 60,000. It is crucial to view the property's specific amenities and negotiable components to determine the final rental amount.

faqs.question: Are independent houses in Sector 105 generally furnished or unfurnished
faqs.answer: Sector 105 offers a balanced mix of furnishing options. The majority of new builder floors tend to be semi-furnished, including modular kitchens, modern wardrobes, and essential light fixtures. However, there is a good selection of fully-furnished independent houses catering to corporate leases or those seeking immediate occupancy. We recommend clarifying the exact inclusions before signing the lease to ensure all your needs are met.

faqs.question: What is the standard lease duration when I rent house in Sector 105
faqs.answer: The standard lease agreement for residential properties in Gurgaon, including Sector 105, is typically 11 months, which is then renewable upon mutual agreement. Some landlords are open to 12-month or longer agreements, especially for high-value properties or corporate tenants. Ensure the lease includes clauses addressing the lock-in period, notice period for termination, and terms for rent escalation upon renewal.

faqs.question: What security deposit is required for rental properties in this sector
faqs.answer: The standard security deposit in Sector 105 is generally equivalent to two months' rent. However, depending on the demand for the specific property or if the house is fully furnished with expensive amenities, some landlords may request three months' rent as a deposit. This deposit is refundable upon vacating the premises, provided there is no damage to the property beyond normal wear and tear and all dues are cleared.

faqs.question: Is Sector 105 well-connected for daily commuting to Cyber City
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 105 boasts excellent connectivity, particularly due to its proximity to the Dwarka Expressway. This major corridor significantly streamlines travel towards Cyber City and other commercial areas like Udyog Vihar. While traffic conditions can vary, the improved road infrastructure offers a relatively quick commute compared to other peripheral sectors of Gurgaon.

faqs.question: Who is typically responsible for external maintenance of independent houses
faqs.answer: In most agreements for independent houses, the landlord is responsible for major structural repairs, external painting, and repairs related to building structure or core utility systems like main plumbing lines. The tenant is usually responsible for minor internal maintenance, replacing consumables (bulbs, fuses), and general upkeep. Detailed maintenance responsibilities should be clearly outlined in the rental agreement.

faqs.question: Are pets generally allowed in rental houses in Sector 105
faqs.answer: Pet policies are entirely at the discretion of the individual landlord when you rent an independent house. While independent houses are generally more pet-friendly than apartment complexes, many landlords still restrict pets, especially large breeds. If you have pets, it is crucial to explicitly inform us upfront so we can filter listings to only include pet-friendly independent houses for your consideration.

faqs.question: What utility charges are tenants responsible for paying monthly
faqs.answer: Tenants are typically responsible for all consumed utility charges. This includes electricity based on individual meter readings, water usage (though sometimes included in a small monthly maintenance fee), and cooking gas. If the property uses a Genset for power backup, the fuel costs or related maintenance charges are also usually borne by the tenant.

faqs.question: How soon can I move into a property after finalizing the agreement
faqs.answer: The move-in timeline is generally quite fast once the agreement is signed, the security deposit is paid, and the first month's rent is transferred. This typically takes 3 to 7 working days, allowing time for stamp duty registration of the lease agreement and necessary utility transfers. If the property requires minor cleaning or repair, this may extend the timeline slightly.

faqs.question: Do I need a broker to rent house in Sector 105 Gurgaon
faqs.answer: While you can search independently, utilizing a professional broker specializing in Sector 105 significantly streamlines the process. We offer verified listings, handle legal documentation, negotiate favorable terms, and provide localized support, ensuring you secure the best property efficiently and safely, minimizing the risks associated with private dealings.
